channel.title: Far casting (still looking for help)
channel.description:
basically when i cast with normal magics it stands still, which i wanted, but when i use ancients after every cast i run forward, ive searched all over the net and i couldnt find anything on it. would someone be able to help me out?
i was reading a guide which didnt work. but apparently there could be a deadlock or something? could someone please help me out here? thank you
EDIT; its the same with range runs in after you fire a shot.
